detaileddescription.para: Set the current location of the file selector.

parameterdescription.para: The current path of the selector.

simplesect.para: TRUE if the current location was successfully changed, FALSE otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Set wheter to only allow selecting directories.

parameterdescription.para: TRUE if only directories can be selected, FALSE if files can also be selected.

detaileddescription.para: Check whether the file selector allows only selecting directories.

simplesect.para: TRUE if only directories can be selected.

detaileddescription.para: Set whether a selected file must exist.

parameterdescription.para: TRUE if the selected file must exist.

detaileddescription.para: Check whether the selector allows selecting non-existent files.

simplesect.para: TRUE if the selected file must exist, FALSE if a non-existent file can be selected.

detaileddescription.para: Get the selected file in the selector.

simplesect.para: The path of the selected file. The caller should g_free the returned string.

detaileddescription.para: Get the list of selected files in the selector.

simplesect.para: A list of paths for the selected files. The caller must g_free the contents of the list, and g_list_free the list.

parameterdescription.para: TRUE if selecting multiple files should be allowed.

detaileddescription.para: Set the suggested file to have selected at startup.
Set custom functions to read the names of files.
Create a new GntFile for a directory.
